node.display_long_description:
跨越新的维度，探索神秘岛的各个超现实纪元！

欢迎来到神秘岛：阴谋与背叛，为这座美丽的小岛染上了一片奇幻而神秘的色彩。不妨登岛冒险，探索更深层次的联系，揭开家族背叛背后的残酷真相吧。

继大受欢迎的经典游戏系列《神秘岛》之后，独立工作室Cyan又对其进行了重新构思与全面重制，推出了备受期待的VR版。该版本采用全新的美术设计、音乐、互动方式以及可选随机谜题，并可通过Oculus Quest畅玩，定能为玩家带来不一样的神秘岛VR体验。


开启纪元之旅，破解各种谜题，成为传奇故事中的一部分。

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Hello, everyone! Our "Translations Achieved" Patch (Patch 3) for Myst on Quest is now out!

We are happy to announce that for the first time ever, all text/subtitles in Myst have been fully localized for various languages (more information on that below).

Achievements are now a part of the game as well, in case you are seeking an extra challenge to collect them all!

We are planning a future patch for our journaling/screenshot system, but in the meantime, you can continue to use the Oculus system-level screenshot tool to take note of what you see in the game.

Everywhere
- Fixed a few more polygons
- Fixed a few more textures
- Fixed a few more meshes
- Fixed a few more collisions
- Fixed a few more LODs
- Fixed a few more paging issues
- Added Achievements

Interface
- Added localization (French, Italian, German, Spanish (Latin America), Portuguese (Brazil), Korean, Japanese, & Chinese (Simplified))
- Fixed drawers being over-pulled

Main Menu
- Added an option to teleport to a safe spot to avoid stuckage
- Fixed menus - no opening while teleporting

Myst Island
- Fixed grabbing a book after... it might not be there
- Fixed a disappearing Selenitic book 
- Fixed a sound issue with Achenar's chest
- Added wind sound in the tower when appropriate
- Fixed the interior of planetarium from magically vanishing

Mechanical
- Fixed the elevator door closing on player... to avoid injury
- Fixed the exhaust sound not being played sometimes

Stoneship
- Fixed lighting in the generator and Achenar's room
- Fixed - no more standing on Sirrus' desk

Selenitic
- Fixed a lighting issue with the mazerunner

Channelwood
- Fixed the disappearing book room elevator handle

node.reviewDescription:
I want to start by saying I highly recommend this to everyone. Myst is the best puzzle game out there, and this version absolutely does it justice. However, there are a couple of issues that could have easily been fixed. 

First, I wish they had kept the original FMV actors because the new CG characters don't look great. 

I also wish there were maybe a system to take notes within the game or more easily take pictures. You can take screenshots from the Oculus menu, but it's not extremely convenient to use. My reason for this is you will come across things you need to remember. In the past, I would just write the info down or draw a quick diagram for the constellations and things like that. It can be really difficult trying to remember everything you need to without some sort of note or picture system. 

Lastly, it can be hard to tell what is able to be interacted with just due to the nature of VR. They've certainly tried to fix this in a few places, notably the library. You can't really interact with the burned booze anymore since it would be awkward in VR to clearly choose which book to pick up. I definitely think this will in general be an issue with games that weren't originally built for VR, but it's definitely worth noting given it might add a bit of frustration at times. 

That being said, those are constructive criticisms not reasons to avoid this game. I've wanted Myst VR for so long and I'm happy they did it justice. This is absolutely my new favorite way to play AND I'm happy there's randomized puzzles too so you actually have to play the game even if you remember the original answers. 

Excellent game and definitely worth the purchase.

developerResponse.body:
Thank you for sharing this feedback, Gamer4Life137 - we appreciate your kind words and critique. 
You'll be happy to hear a note-taking feature is being added to the game in an upcoming patch. 
Best wishes!
